question:
Consider the following statements about the Inter-operable Criminal Justice System (ICJS):
  1. It aims to integrate the CCTNS project with the e-courts and e-prisons databases
  2. This system is being established under the Ministry of Home Affairs
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The Inter-operable Criminal Justice System (ICJS) aims to integrate the CCTNS project with the e-courts and e- prisons. It will facilitate data exchange between different stakeholders of criminal justice system. The crime and criminal tracking network & systems (CCTNS) project aims to create a national database of crimes and criminals as a resource for all stakeholders including the policy makers. The database created under CCTNS portal is being linked with the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MORTH) database for vehicle registrations. <u>Second statement is also correct</u>. The ICJS system is being established under the Ministry of Home Affairs.
